original_text:
Emerald Smash
Insieme alle roulette, le slot fruttate sono forse il grande classico dei giochi d’azzardo, le uniche che associamo quasi istintivamente all’immagine dei grandi casinò di Las Vegas. La Inspired ha reso omaggio alla tradizione creando una slot con dei frutti fatti di smeraldo, ma provando a portare una ventata di novità inserendo degli ulteriori simboli che andando in mille pezzi assicurano vincite di un certo livello. Partiamo però dalla grafica, che è molto scarna, priva di fronzoli. Non per forza questo è un tratto negativo, anzi, dal nostro punto di vista troviamo che una slot a tema frutta non viene creata dagli sviluppatori per stupire con animazioni e effetti speciali, ma piuttosto per offrire un prodotto dal gameplay semplice e intuitivo. La griglia di gioco si staglia su uno sfondo che dal rosa sfuma al viola, con pochi tasti a comparsa posti ai lati. Infatti, durante il gioco il tasto Start, Impostazioni e Valore puntata scompaiono per riapparire una volta che i rulli si fermano. Un motivetto elettronico per nulla invadente fa da sfondo al gioco, a cui si sovrappone un saggio laser per segnalare la vincita.
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
La griglia di gioco ha 5 rulli e 3 linee, con 30 linee di pagamento fisse che non possono essere modificate. La puntata minima per un singolo spin è di 0,30 €, ossia 0,03 € per linea, mentre la massima è di 90 €. In caso di vincita su più linee, viene pagata solo quella più alta. Le combinazioni vincenti vanno da sinistra a destra. Dalle impostazioni è possibile disattivare i suoni, azionare la funzione Gioco per mancini che inverte la posizione dei pulsanti e attivare il turbo per una rotazione dei rulli accelerata. Tenendo premuto il tasto Start si accede alla pagina dei giri automatici. Da qui è possibile impostarne da un minimo di 5 a un massimo di 100, oltre a impostare dei limiti di perdita o di vincita. Emerald Smash ha un ritorno teorico al giocatore (return to player o RTP) abbastanza buono, pari al 96,5%.
Simboli e funzionalità di Emerald Smash
Per avere combinazioni vincenti è necessario che sui rulli si presentino almeno 3 simboli, tranne che per il 7 per cui ne bastano 2. In ordine di valore, i simboli più bassi sono il limone, l’uva e le ciliegie, seguiti dall’arancia, dalla fragola e dall’anguria. Il quadrifoglio e la stella hanno un ottimo ritorno, anche se a valere più di tutti è il numero 7. Per fare un esempio concreto, se decidiamo di puntare la scommessa minima, 0,30 € e vediamo apparire 5 simboli 7, allora verremo ripagati con ben 5 €.
Di tanto in tanto sui rulli possono apparire degli smeraldi di colore verde che si spezzano e liberano un simbolo a caso. Tutti gli smeraldi presenti prenderanno le sembianze di quel simbolo, così da creare una combinazione vincente o nel caso sulla griglia siano presenti altri simboli, di incrementare la vincita.
In Emerald Smash non sono presenti Wild e Scatter.

raw_translation.response:
Emerald Smash
Along with roulette, fruit slot machines are perhaps the great classic of gambling games, the only ones we almost instinctively associate with the image of the great casinos of Las Vegas. Inspired has paid homage to tradition by creating a slot machine with fruits made of emerald, but trying to bring a wave of innovation by inserting additional symbols that, by breaking into a thousand pieces, ensure winnings of a certain level. Let's start with the graphics, which are very plain and without frills. Not necessarily a negative trait, in fact, from our point of view, we find that a fruit-themed slot machine is not created by developers to amaze with animations and special effects, but rather to offer a product with simple and intuitive gameplay. The game grid stands out on a background that fades from pink to purple, with few buttons appearing at the sides. In fact, during the game, the Start, Settings, and Bet Value buttons disappear and reappear once the reels stop. An electronica tune serves as background music for the game, with an overlying laser beam indicating a win.
Main features of the slot machine
The game grid has 5 reels and 3 lines, with 30 fixed pay lines that cannot be modified. The minimum bet for a single spin is €0.30, or €0.03 per line, while the maximum is €90. In case of a win on multiple lines, only the highest one is paid. Winning combinations go from left to right. From the settings, it is possible to turn off the sound, activate the Left-hand mode that reverses the position of the buttons, and activate Turbo for an accelerated reel rotation. Holding down the Start button accesses the automatic spins page. From there, it is possible to set from a minimum of 5 to a maximum of 100 spins, as well as set loss or win limits. Emerald Smash has a fairly good theoretical return to the player (RTP), equal to 96.5%.
Symbols and functionalities of Emerald Smash
To have winning combinations, it is necessary to have at least 3 symbols on the reels, except for 7 for which 2 are enough. In order of value, the lowest symbols are the lemon, grape, and cherry, followed by the orange, strawberry, and watermelon. The clover and star have a good return, although the number 7 is worth the most. For a concrete example, if we decide to bet the minimum bet, €0.30, and see 5 symbols 7 appear, then we will be paid back €5.
From time to time, green emeralds that break and release a random symbol can appear on the reels. All the emeralds present will take on the appearance of that symbol, thus creating a winning combination or, if there are other symbols on the grid, increasing the win.
Wild and Scatter symbols are not present in Emerald Smash.

Review:
 
Gameplay Features

Emerald Smash is a classic fruit-themed slot machine game developed by Inspired with simple and easy-to-understand gameplay. The game has a 5x3 reel format with 30 fixed pay lines that can't be modified. The game features auto spins, the ability to activate Turbo mode, and you can adjust loss or win limits from the automatic spins page. Emerald Smash doesn't have any bonus rounds or gamble features.

Symbols and Pay Lines

Emerald Smash has several symbols with varying values, including lemons, grapes, cherries, oranges, strawberry, watermelon, clovers, stars, and the number 7. The lowest symbols are the lemon, grape, and cherry, while the clover and star have a good return. The number 7 is the most valuable symbol in the game. To win the game, the player needs at least three matching symbols on the reels, except for 7 which requires only two. Winning combinations go from left to right.

Bet Range and Automatic Spins

The minimum bet for a single spin is €0.30 (€0.01 per line), while the maximum bet is €90. The game offers automatic spins, with players able to set from a minimum of 5 to a maximum of 100 spins. From the automatic spins page, players can also set limits on losses or wins. The game also has Turbo mode for players who prefer faster reel rotation.

Theoretical Return to Player (RTP)

Emerald Smash has a theoretical return to player (RTP) of 96.5%, which is above average when compared to other slot games. This means the game pays out 96.5% of the total amount wagered by players over an extended period of time.

Overall Game Experience

Emerald Smash offers a classic fruit-themed slot experience with a touch of innovation with the addition of emerald symbols. The graphics are plain and without distractions, with the game grid set against a fading pink and purple background. The game features a simple electronica tune as its background music. The gameplay is straightforward, with auto spins, turbo mode, and win or loss limits available to players. The lack of bonus rounds or gamble features may deter some players, but the 96.5% RTP and the opportunity to win up to €5 from a €0.30 bet with five 7s makes this game worth playing.

Review: Emerald Smash
Along with roulette, fruit slot machines are perhaps the great classic of gambling games, the only ones we almost instinctively associate with the image of the great casinos of Las Vegas. Inspired has paid homage to tradition by creating a slot machine with fruits made of emerald, but trying to bring a wave of innovation by inserting additional symbols that, by breaking into a thousand pieces, ensure winnings of a certain level. Let's start with the graphics, which are very plain and without frills. Not necessarily a negative trait, in fact, from our point of view, we find that a fruit-themed slot machine is not created by developers to amaze with animations and special effects, but rather to offer a product with simple and intuitive gameplay. The game grid stands out on a background that fades from pink to purple, with few buttons appearing at the sides. In fact, during the game, the Start, Settings, and Bet Value buttons disappear and reappear once the reels stop. An electronica tune serves as background music for the game, with an overlying laser beam indicating a win.
Main features of the slot machine
The game grid has 5 reels and 3 lines, with 30 fixed pay lines that cannot be modified. The minimum bet for a single spin is €0.30, or €0.03 per line, while the maximum is €90. In case of a win on multiple lines, only the highest one is paid. Winning combinations go from left to right. From the settings, it is possible to turn off the sound, activate the Left-hand mode that reverses the position of the buttons, and activate Turbo for an accelerated reel rotation. Holding down the Start button accesses the automatic spins page. From there, it is possible to set from a minimum of 5 to a maximum of 100 spins, as well as set loss or win limits. Emerald Smash has a fairly good theoretical return to the player (RTP), equal to 96.5%.
Symbols and functionalities of Emerald Smash
To have winning combinations, it is necessary to have at least 3 symbols on the reels, except for 7 for which 2 are enough. In order of value, the lowest symbols are the lemon, grape, and cherry, followed by the orange, strawberry, and watermelon. The clover and star have a good return, although the number 7 is worth the most. For a concrete example, if we decide to bet the minimum bet, €0.30, and see 5 symbols 7 appear, then we will be paid back €5.
From time to time, green emeralds that break and release a random symbol can appear on the reels. All the emeralds present will take on the appearance of that symbol, thus creating a winning combination or, if there are other symbols on the grid, increasing the win.
Wild and Scatter symbols are not present in Emerald Smash.
